document_data.name: Hagala's Manyturrets
document_data.mainbody: '''Hagala's Manyturrets''' was an old and rather drafty inn in the village of [[Amphail (village)|Amphail]].
document_data.Services: This inn rented out their rooms at a price of 1 [[silver piece]] per person for each night, though one could instead opt to pay 8 silver pieces to stay for a [[tenday]]. This rental fee did not provide any food, though Hagala's always had tankards of cold [[ale]] and bowls of hot soup on offer at a cost of 1 [[copper piece]].
